description.narrative: This initiative supports activities undertaken to deliver the Australian Development Scholarships (ADS) program in Port Moresby Papua New Guinea (PNG). Up until now ADS in Port Moresby has been managed under initiative INI815. Under recent changes by the scholarships section there has been a need by all posts managing scholarships to consolidate funding for current 'on-scholarship' students under a single initiative. On-scholarship refers to awardees in Australia and the associated costs which include tuition fees and living expenses. This funding will support the intake of the 2011 awardees. While up to 148 ADS awardees are selected each year, usual study programs vary in length from one to four years. This means there are around 300 ADS awardees from PNG studying in Australia at any one time. The total value of this initiative is $22.5 million over 7 years, starting 2010-11.
